q: What does checking 'Resize text' to 200% ensure?
o: Content and functionality remain available without loss

q: What is the purpose of 'aria-live="off"'?
Which GSC report shows 'Merchant Listings' issues?
What is 'Parsing' error in WCAG 4.1.1 (Valid Markup)?
o: Duplicate IDs, unclosed tags, broken attributes

q: What implies 'Keyboard accessible' drag-and-drop?
o: User can 'grab' and 'drop' item using keys (e.g. Space/Arrows)

q: In GSC, can you inspect URLs from a different domain?
What does 'aria-controls' identify?
o: Element(s) whose content/presence is controlled by this element
